author: Nikola Tesla
title: Great Moments are born Great Oppurtunity

questions.title: Which one I prefer the most?
The most generous person I've ever met is...
What is the name of my tower in Long Island, New York?
Who invented the radio first?
questions.tip: I don't care that they stole my idea... I care that they don't have any of their own. Marconi is a good fellow. Let him continue. He is using seventeen of my patents
